name: Keali
description:
Keali includes
  • A complex and engaging movement system with a high skill ceiling for you to explore and master.
  • Extra challenges in the form of optional mural fragments to unlock extra lore and test your skills.
  • Unique levels that explore custom platforms, threats, and puzzles.
  • Levels have multiple solutions. Solve levels your way.

  • A 1-button tether that auto targets based on your movement, allowing you to attach to world terrain and tether points.

  • Race against the vines to complete levels before they cover everything.

  • Master when to sprint and when not too, saving energy.

  • Dash over large gaps.
